channel.title: The Multiverse And A Bag Of Potato Chips
channel.description: Enter the multiverse! We play wierd RPG's (Role Playing Games) every week for your ears. Host Anthony Silvio and guests explore the multiverse... and also a bag of potato chips.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Enter the multiverse! We play wierd RPG's

itunes:owner.itunes:name: The Multiverse and a Bag Of Potato Chips

channel.itunes:author: MovieFlip

image.title: The Multiverse and a Bag Of Potato Chips

item.title: Snack Sized Multiverse [#4]
item.itunes:author: MovieFlip
item.itunes:summary:
Now with the shackles of having only but one world thrown away the true exploration can begin, so the party solve a murder, have a chili dog, and invent airplane travel
Host: Anthony Silvio. Guests: Daniel LaPlante (Mignolaverse) and Daniel Haskins.
Get updates on the podcast on twitter
twitter.com/movieflip
E-mail the show at
MultiverseChipPod@gmail.com

item.title: The Over-Verce - On Overwatch Finale [#3]
item.itunes:author: MovieFlip
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode our beloved misfits get thunderstruck, go to a bar, and witness metaphysics break down
Host: Anthony Silvio. Guests: Daniel LaPlante (Mignolaverse) and Daniel Haskins.
Get updates on the podcast on twitter

item.itunes:author: MovieFlip
item.itunes:summary:

Host: Anthony Silvio. Guests: Daniel LaPlante (Mignolaverse) and Daniel Haskins.

item.title: On Overwatch Part 1 [#1]
item.itunes:author: MovieFlip
item.itunes:summary:
In this first episode the whole premise of the show is set up and the group takes on a large group of multi-dimensional clones, a long walk down 7th street, and trying to make change for a hundred dollar bill. Host: Anthony Silvio. Guests: Daniel LaPlante (Mignolaverse) and Daniel Haskins.
Get updates on the podcast on twitter
https://twitter.com/movieflip
E-mail the show at
MultiverseChipPod@gmail.com
